data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: During the Reconquista period, Christians reconquered the Iberian Peninsula from Moorish domination. Afonso Henriques and ____ successors, aided ____ military ____ orders, pushed ____ to ____ out ____ Moors. At ____ time Portugal covered ____ half ____ its ____ area. In 1249, the Reconquista ended with the capture of the Algarve and complete expulsion of the last Moorish settlements on the southern coast, giving Portugal its present-day borders, with minor exceptions.
data.partBlankContent: During the Reconquista period, Christians reconquered the Iberian Peninsula from Moorish domination. Afonso Henriques and h__ successors, aided b_ military mona____ orders, pushed sout_____ to dr___ out t__ Moors. At th__ time Portugal covered ab___ half o_ its pre____ area. In 1249, the Reconquista ended with the capture of the Algarve and complete expulsion of the last Moorish settlements on the southern coast, giving Portugal its present-day borders, with minor exceptions.
data.answer: 在重新征服时期，基督徒从摩尔人的统治下重新征服了伊比利亚半岛。阿方索·恩里克斯和他的继任者在军事君主命令的帮助下，向南推进，驱逐摩尔人。当时葡萄牙的国土面积约为现在的一半。1249年，重新征服以占领阿尔加维结束，并完全驱逐了南部海岸最后的摩尔人定居点，这就是葡萄牙今天的边界，只有少数例外。
